samples.instruction: Ex-servicemen pillaikkalukku padippu salugaigal enna?
samples.current_output: Benefits: 1) TNPSC-la 2% horizontal reservation 2) Engineering/Medical admission-la reservation 3) Sainik School admission priority 4) AFMC, NDA-la priority 5) Fee concession pala colleges-la. Prime Minister's Scholarship: тВ╣36,000-60,000/year professional courses-ku. Kendriya Sainik Board scholarship available. Apply with father's discharge certificate.

samples.instruction: 12th padikkumbodhae enna competitive exams-ku prepare aagalam?
samples.current_output:
**Competitive Exams During 12th:**

**1. NEET (Medical):** PCB, May exam, Start from 11th

**2. JEE (Engineering):** PCM, Jan & April, Start from 11th

**3. CUET (Central Universities):** Domain + Language + GK

**4. CLAT (Law):** English, GK, Legal, Logical, Maths - Dec exam

**5. NDA (Defence):** 16.5-19.5 age, April & Sept exam, 12th appearing eligible

**6. KVPY:** Science scholarship, Class 11-12, Nov exam

**Timeline:**
- NEET/JEE: Start Class 11
- CLAT: Start Class 11
- NDA: Class 12

**Tips:**
- Board = 60-70% competitive syllabus
- Identify extra topics
- Join test series early
- Balance both preparations

samples.instruction: NEET fail роЖройро╛ро▓рпН роОройрпНрой alternatives роЗро░рпБроХрпНроХро┐ро▒родрпБ?
samples.current_output: Medical field alternatives: 1) B.Sc Nursing - no NEET 2) BDS (Dental) - lower cutoff 3) BAMS/BHMS/BUMS - Ayurveda/Homeopathy 4) B.Sc Allied Health Sciences 5) Pharmacy (B.Pharm) 6) Physiotherapy (BPT) 7) Veterinary (NEET separate cutoff). Other options: 1) Dropper year - many succeed 2) B.Sc Biology тЖТ Research 3) Biotechnology. Reality check: 18 lakh applicants, 1 lakh seats - alternatives are not failure, different path.

samples.instruction: MD/MS (medical postgraduate) admission eppadi?
samples.current_output: NEET PG exam compulsory. Steps: 1) MBBS + 1 year internship complete pannunga 2) NEET PG ezhuthunga 3) State counselling/All India quota counselling 4) Seat allotment. Govt college fee: тВ╣50,000-1 lakh/year. Private: тВ╣10-50 lakhs. Duration: 3 years. Bond service required in TN.

samples.instruction: Government Arts and Science colleges-la BA/BSc admission eppadi?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) www.tngasa.in-la online apply 2) +2 marks basis rank 3) Counselling date announcement 4) Certificate verification 5) College allotment. Fee: Govt colleges-la yearly тВ╣500-2000 only. 7.5% reservation government school students-ku irukku.

samples.instruction: ITI Course patri full details thanga. Free-ya padikkalamaa?
samples.current_output:
**ITI Complete Guide:**

**What:** Technical skill training, NCVT certified

**Eligibility:** 8th/10th pass based on trade

**Duration:** 6 months - 2 years

**Popular Trades:**
- Electrician, Fitter, COPA, Mechanic, Welder

**Fees:**
- Govt ITI: FREE (тВ╣100-500 nominal)
- Private: тВ╣10,000-50,000/year

**Free Training:**
- SC/ST: Free + тВ╣500-1,000/month stipend
- BC/MBC: Free tuition

**Admission:** itidata.tn.gov.in (May-June)

**After ITI:**
- Apprenticeship: тВ╣5,000-9,000/month
- Direct jobs
- Diploma lateral entry

samples.instruction: Part-time job student-aaga irukkumbodhu seiyalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Part-time options: 1) Tuition teaching - тВ╣200-500/hour 2) Content writing - freelance 3) Data entry - weekend work 4) Campus jobs - library, canteen assistance 5) Internships - stipend based 6) Online tutoring - Chegg, Vedantu 7) Weekend coaching classes assistant. Rules: College permission may be needed. Balance: Studies first priority. Tax: Above тВ╣2.5 lakh/year - tax applicable. Skills: Communication, time management develop.

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: 30 vayasu kadandhaal padikka late
samples.current_output: Fact: Fact: Learning has no age limit! Distance education: IGNOU, TNOU - no age bar. Success stories: People completing degrees at 40, 50, even 60. Benefits: Career switch, personal satisfaction, promotion eligibility. Government job age limit = only restriction (up to 35-40 for many). Skill courses: No age limit. Your motivation to learn > Your age. Start today!

samples.instruction: Sports quota-la college admission vaanga enna thaguthi venum?
samples.current_output: State/National level-la participate panniyirukkanum. Sports certificate (SAI/Association certified) venum. District, State, National - edha level-la play panniyirundhalum quota-kku apply pannalam. Trials nadakkum.

samples.instruction: NEET Tamil Medium-ро▓рпН роОро┤рпБродро▓ро╛рооро╛? Translation problem роЗро░рпБроХрпНроХрпБрооро╛?
samples.current_output:
**NEET Tamil Medium:**

**роЖроорпН, Tamil-ро▓рпН роОро┤рпБродро▓ро╛роорпН!**

**Available Languages:**
- Tamil, English, Hindi
- Assamese, Bengali, Gujarati
- Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi
- Odia, Punjabi, Telugu, Urdu

**How to Choose:**
- Application form-ро▓рпН medium select
- Exam day-ро▓рпН bilingual paper роХро┐роЯрпИроХрпНроХрпБроорпН
- Tamil + English роЗро░рогрпНроЯрпБроорпН printed

**Translation Issues (Past):**
- Some years translation errors reported
- Medical terms translation роЪро┐ро▓ роирпЗро░роорпН confusing
- NTA has improved over years

**Tips for Tamil Medium Students:**

1. **NCERT Tamil Version рокроЯро┐роХрпНроХро╡рпБроорпН**
   - TN Textbook Corporation version
   - Terminology same as NEET

2. **English Terms-роЙроорпН родрпЖро░ро┐роЮрпНроЪро┐ро░рпБроХрпНроХрогрпБроорпН**
   - Scientific names English-ро▓рпН родро╛ройрпН
   - Chemical formulas same
   - Diagrams labeling English

3. **Both Versions рокроЯро┐роХрпНроХро╡рпБроорпН**
   - Tamil-ро▓рпН concept рокрпБро░ро┐роЮрпНроЪрпБроХрпНроХро╡рпБроорпН
   - English terminology remember

4. **Mock Tests Tamil-ро▓рпН роОро┤рпБродрпБроЩрпНроХ**
   - Translation style рокрпБро░ро┐ропрпБроорпН
   - Time management practice

**Exam Day Tips:**
- Question confusing-ройро╛ English version рокро╛ро░рпБроЩрпНроХ
- Both languages printed in same booklet
- Scientific terms same in both

**Success Stories:**
- Many Tamil medium students cleared NEET
- Govt school 7.5% reservation helps
- Language is not a barrier!

samples.instruction: Coimbatore-la textile/fashion industry-related courses ulladha?
samples.current_output: Coimbatore textile hub courses: 1) PSG Tech - B.Tech Textile Technology 2) Kumaraguru - Textile courses 3) NIFT Coimbatore - Fashion (opening soon) 4) Government Polytechnic - Textile 5) ITI - Textile trades. Industry connect: Internships in mills, design houses. Job placement: Tirupur garment cluster nearby = excellent opportunities. Specialized: Knitwear technology, Apparel production.

samples.instruction: JEE Main & Advanced роОройрпНро▒ро╛ро▓рпН роОройрпНрой? IIT-роХрпНроХрпБ роОрокрпНрокроЯро┐ рокрпЛро╡родрпБ?
samples.current_output:
**JEE (Joint Entrance Examination):**

**Two Levels:**

**1. JEE Main:**
- For: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs, State Engineering Colleges
- Conducted by: NTA
- Sessions: January & April (2 attempts/year)
- Based on: JEE Main rank

**2. JEE Advanced:**
- For: IITs only
- Eligibility: Top 2.5 lakh in JEE Main
- One attempt/year (June)
- Toughest engineering exam!

**JEE Main Pattern:**

| Subject | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Physics | 30 | 100 |
| Chemistry | 30 | 100 |
| Maths | 30 | 100 |
| **Total** | **90** | **300** |

- Mode: Online (Computer Based)
- Duration: 3 hours
- Negative Marking: -1 for wrong

**JEE Advanced Pattern:**
- Paper 1 & Paper 2 (3 hours each)
- Multiple question types
- More complex than Main

**IIT Admission Path:**
```
12th PCM (75%+) тЖТ JEE Main (Top 2.5L) тЖТ JEE Advanced тЖТ IIT!
```

**Tamil Nadu Students:**
- TNEA (State counselling) accepts JEE Main score
- Anna University, Govt colleges through TNEA
- tneaonline.org

**Eligibility:**
- 12th pass with PCM
- 75% aggregate (65% for SC/ST)
- Max 2 consecutive attempts in 3 years

samples.instruction: роЙрогрпНроорпИропро╛ рокрпКропрпНропро╛: Myth: Coaching роЗро▓рпНро▓ро╛роо NEET/JEE crack рокрогрпНрог impossible
samples.current_output: роЙрогрпНроорпИ: Fact: Self-study toppers exist every year! Free resources: YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy), NPTEL, SWAYAM, Government free coaching. Key factors: Discipline, proper study plan, consistent practice. Coaching helps but not mandatory. Many poor students crack using library + free online resources. Your determination > coaching centre brand.

samples.instruction: NMMS Exam роОройрпНро▒ро╛ро▓рпН роОройрпНрой? роОрокрпНрокроЯро┐ prepare роЪрпЖропрпНро╡родрпБ?
samples.current_output:
**National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship (NMMS):**

**роОройрпНрой роЗродрпБ?**
- Class 8 рооро╛рогро╡ро░рпНроХро│рпБроХрпНроХро╛рой scholarship exam
- Pass роЖройро╛ро▓рпН Class 9-12 ро╡ро░рпИ тВ╣12,000/year

**родроХрпБродро┐:**
- Class 8 Govt/Govt-aided school student
- Class 7-ро▓рпН 55%+ marks (SC/ST: 50%)
- Parent income < тВ╣3.5 lakh/year

**Exam Pattern:**

| Paper | Questions | Marks | Time |
|-------|-----------|-------|------|
| MAT (Mental Ability) | 90 | 90 | 90 min |
| SAT (Scholastic Aptitude) | 90 | 90 | 90 min |

**MAT Topics:**
- Reasoning (Series, Analogy, Classification)
- Coding-Decoding
- Blood Relations
- Direction sense
- Mirror/Water images

**SAT Topics:**
- Science (Class 7-8 syllabus)
- Social Science (History, Geography, Civics)
- Mathematics

**Preparation Tips:**
1. Class 7-8 NCERT/State Board thorough рокроЯро┐роХрпНроХро╡рпБроорпН
2. Previous year papers practice
3. Online mock tests
4. Reasoning books (RS Aggarwal Junior)

**Important Dates:**
- Application: July-August
- Exam: November
- Result: January

**Apply:** School HM роорпВро▓роорпН

samples.instruction: Exam day-la sick aayitten, alternative option irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Options vary by exam: Board exams - No re-exam, arrear attempt only. Competitive exams - Generally no re-test. College internal - Medical certificate submit, re-test possible. Medical emergency: 1) Get doctor certificate immediately 2) Inform exam authority same day 3) Apply for special consideration. Some exams: PWD/Medical emergency provisions exist. NEET/JEE: One attempt lost, next year continue. Prevention: Health priority before exams, insurance coverage.

samples.instruction: TNSDC (Tamil Nadu Skill Development Corporation) free courses роОройрпНрой?
samples.current_output: TNSDC offers 100+ free courses: 1) IT/Software - Web development, Data entry 2) Manufacturing - CNC, Welding 3) Healthcare - Nursing assistant, Lab technician 4) Retail - Sales, customer service 5) Hospitality - Hotel management basics 6) Construction - Mason, plumber. Duration: 1-6 months. Certification + placement assistance. Apply: www.tnskill.tn.gov.in. Age: 18-35. Free hostel for outstation candidates.

samples.instruction: Fashion Design padikka Tamil Nadu-la enge povadhu?

samples.instruction: College-ku poga panam illai. Free-ya padikka mudiyumaa?
samples.current_output: Mudiyum da! Government colleges-la fees romba kammi - yearly тВ╣1000-5000 only. Scholarship apply pannu - BC/MBC/SC/ST full scholarship kidaikkum. Distance education - IGNOU, TNOU almost free. Skill training - TNSDC 100% free. Padikka aasai irundhaa vazhi irukku!

samples.instruction: JEE Main vs JEE Advanced - роОройрпНрой difference?
samples.current_output: JEE Main: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs admission. JEE Advanced: IITs only. Eligibility: JEE Main top 2.5 lakh тЖТ JEE Advanced eligible. Difficulty: Advanced >> Main. Pattern: Main - 90 Qs, 300 marks, 3 hours. Advanced - 2 papers, 3 hours each, complex patterns. Attempts: Main - 6 (3 years ├Ч 2 sessions), Advanced - 2 consecutive years. Strategy: First secure good Main rank, then focus Advanced.

guidelines:
EDUCATION PACK GUIDELINES:
- Tanglish is acceptable for modern education topics
- Keep exam names (NEET, JEE, TNPSC) in English
- Use Tamil for explanations: родрпЗро░рпНро╡рпБ (exam), роХро▓рпНро▓рпВро░ро┐ (college), рокро╛роЯродрпНродро┐роЯрпНроЯроорпН (syllabus)
- Format with emoji headers: ЁЯУЪ, ЁЯОУ, ЁЯУЭ
